title: DRF Restrict the number of models linked
body:
django has a function called `prefetch_related`, and you can suppress the SQL issued by following.

```python
Article.objects.prefetch_related("tags")
```

The value of ManyToMany is saved in the cache and the number of SQL is reduced.

Apply this function,

```python
class ArticleViewSets(ModelViewSet):
    def get_queryset(self):
        return Article.objects.all().prefetch_related(Prefetch("tags", Tag.objects.filter(enable=True)))
```

It is possible to filter the value of the article.tags returned by specifying such as:

However, this method can not change the display based on records such as releasing all tags when publishing the contents of tags only when the status of the レコード is drafted.


`prefetch_related_objects`

If you use prefetch_related_object to write the processing as described above, it looks like this:


```python
class ArticleViewSets(ModelViewSet):
    def retrieve(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        instance: Article = self.get_object()
        tags = Tag.objects.all()
        # ステータスに応じて返却するファイルを制限する
        if instance.status == Article.StatusChoices.DRAFT:
             tags = Tag.objects.none()
        prefetch_related_objects([instance], Prefetch("tags", tags ))
        serializer = self.get_serializer(instance)
        return Response(serializer.data)
```

It is possible to restrict the value of tags to be returned by記載ing this method.
